entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
